title: [Fix]: Applied important fix for softkeyboard visiblity (Issue #5)
message:
[Fix]: Applied important fix for softkeyboard visiblity (Issue #5)

The softkeyboard would not always show on some devices on returning from
activity. Fixes #5.

title: [Doc]: Updated the README to include app link & added alt text
message: [Doc]: Updated the README to include app link & added alt text

title: [Doc][Rea]: Updated README, corrected spelling, & added screenshots
message: [Doc][Rea]: Updated README, corrected spelling, & added screenshots

title: [Ref]: Moved PreferenceUtils from ui.prefs to prefs
message:
[Ref]: Moved PreferenceUtils from ui.prefs to prefs

Updated references

title: Add bool track if sending & set flash to transmit through rotation
message:
Add bool track if sending & set flash to transmit through rotation

[Mod]: MainActivity:
-Added bool to  to know when currently sending a message or not.
Including bundling handling.
-Ensured transcriber safety by cancelling before sending.
[Mod]: MainFragment:
-Set to maintain sending state between pauses (i.e. boolean, button,
text disabled, checkboxes disabled)
-Set to re-send upon fragment reload if currently sending. Thus allowing
for messages to keep flashing between 

[Mod]: Updated manifest version number to 0.1.3 for alpha testing.

title: Fixed isRunning() method & fixed close() null pointer exception
message:
Fixed isRunning() method & fixed close() null pointer exception

[Fix]: MorseTranscriber- isRunning() would only return true when sending
but not transcribing. Now returns true for both.
[Fix]: CameraFlashUtil - Added null check before synchronizing on
camera.

title: [Mod]: Incremented version number (0.1.2) for alpha testing
message:
[Mod]: Incremented version number (0.1.2) for alpha testing

Note that camera-flash will not work on rotation

title: Fixed flash delay, refactored some functionality & added checks
message:
Fixed flash delay, refactored some functionality & added checks

[Fix]: There was a flash delay meaning that took over 200ms to reset.
This was caused by the camera being released and reinitalized, an
uncessary step that was removed.
[Mod]: Other changes to CameraFlashUtil:
-Added checks to to check if the camera has been closed (not null
but closed).
-Added checks for the visibility of surface view and set it to toggle
visible before setting
[Mod]: mainfragment.xml : Set the surgace view to in invisible.

title: Fixed the camera flash & reordered message ending
message:
Fixed the camera flash & reordered message ending

[Fix]: MainActivity:
-Camera flash was set always to be false, fixed this to be set to the
appropriate state.
-Camera flash is set to false after the message is complete. This
prevents double falses.

title: Set checkbox to be disabled during cam flash & set keyboard to hide
message:
Set checkbox to be disabled during cam flash & set keyboard to hide

[Mod][Fix]: MainFragment:
-Set checkboxes to be disabled when sending a message
-Set the virtual keyboard to be hidden when the message is sent (and by
extension, hiding it when when the flashing fragment appears)

title: [Fix]: Keyboard sometimes would not show up onFocus after resume
message:
[Fix]: Keyboard sometimes would not show up onFocus after resume

Fixed this behaviour by removing focus on resume.

title: [Doc]: Updated doc. to be clearer for ScreenFlashFragment
message: [Doc]: Updated doc. to be clearer for ScreenFlashFragment

title: [Mod]: Updated README to provide more information about the app
message:
[Mod]: Updated README to provide more information about the app

Details include:
-Project requirements
-Limitations
-Some mention of future plans

title: [Fix]: Better fix for main to prevent background signals
message:
[Fix]: Better fix for main to prevent background signals

If the activity is not visible AND there have been multiple unseen
signals, then the fragment cancels the transcription, and hides the
fragment on resume.

title: [Mod]: Updated gitignore to ignore proguard files
message: [Mod]: Updated gitignore to ignore proguard files

title: [Mod]: Updated version code/number for next alpha release
message: [Mod]: Updated version code/number for next alpha release

title: Main: Fixed null errors, double starting & background running
message:
Main: Fixed null errors, double starting & background running

[Fix]: In MainActivity:
-MorseTranscriber was sometimes returning null from a headless fragment.
Reinit. in those cases
-Message would continue to send even if we returned to homescreen.
Transcriber is now cancelled in onDestroy()/onPause()
-Message would sometimes restart when the flash fragment was reloaded.
Fixed to only restart if the transcriber is not already running

title: [Fix]: Ensured the camera is closed on resume before reopening
message:
[Fix]: Ensured the camera is closed on resume before reopening

Camera was not always closed before asked for reopening in (as onPause
is not always called before resume).

title: [Mod]: Added padding to checkboxes to make them more clickable
message: [Mod]: Added padding to checkboxes to make them more clickable

title: [Mod]: Added function to determine if the transcriber is running
message:
[Mod]: Added function to determine if the transcriber is running

Returns true if the message is sending.

title: Added hardware feature for autofocus & specified rear cam
message:
Added hardware feature for autofocus & specified rear cam

[Mod]: In CameraFlashUtil:
-Specified the rear camera when opening (some devices may protest
otherwise)
-Added setPreviewCallback(null) for closing the camera 
[Mod]: Added hardware feature "autofocus" to the manifest

title: [Rem]: Removed settings menu from Main
message: [Rem]: Removed settings menu from Main

message: [Add][Mod]: Compressed & added holo-drawable resources

message: [Mod]: Made input one line & set SurfaceView as unfocusable

message: [Mod]: Made Camera + Flash requirements optional

title: [Mod]: Added delay for before + after sending message
message:
[Mod]: Added delay for before + after sending message

Default value is 500ms.

title: [Mod]: Added null check for Cam Flash util in MainFragment
message: [Mod]: Added null check for Cam Flash util in MainFragment

title: [Mod]: Enhanced the CameraFlashUtil to be better ready for work
message: [Mod]: Enhanced the CameraFlashUtil to be better ready for work

title: [Mod][Add]: Updated the application icon(s)
message:
[Mod][Add]: Updated the application icon(s)

Simple icon thrown together in inkscape. A better one will come later.

title: Defined invalid unitTimes, applied some transcriber fixes
message:
Defined invalid unitTimes, applied some transcriber fixes

[Mod]: IMorseTranscriber: setUnitTime(int) now throws an exception if
the unitTime is <= 0
[Mod]: MorseTranscriber:
-Throws exception for unitTime <= 0
-Does not allow blank messages to be sent
[Fix]: MorseTranscriber would have extra-intervals on the end such that:
.=.=.+===.=.=.+++
Where = is the required interval time and + is an extra one appended.
Removed the extra: intra-character ticks, character intervals, and word
intervals from message.

title: [Fix]: Made mainfragment incapable of sending blank messages
message: [Fix]: Made mainfragment incapable of sending blank messages

title: Fixed decode & corrected k. Added toString & string->morse function
message:
Fixed decode & corrected k. Added toString & string->morse function

[Fix]: InternationalMorseCode:
-Fixed the decode function (was using == by mistaken)
-Fixed k; it was the wrong sequence ('r').
[Mod]: MorseDictionary.MorseCharacter:
-Added function to Builder to create MorseCharacters using strings of
dashes and dots (e.g. "-.-.-", "_ . _ _").
-override toString() function to supply more useful information in the
form of string based morse (e.g. a would read ('.-') )

title: Added readme, license and included license in source files
message:
Added readme, license and included license in source files

[Add]: Added README describing the project
[Add]: Added Full apache2 license.
[Mod]: Added apache2 license to source
[Rem]: Removed proguard files from git

title: Updated main frag's CamFlash use,tidied code & updated activity methods
message:
Updated main frag's CamFlash use,tidied code & updated activity methods 

[Mod]: MainFragment was updated to:
-Better handle the closing & opening of CameraFlashUtil (in onPause,
etc)
-Use preferences for camera flash use.
-Introduced simpler function for sending messages
[Dep]: Deprecated the older onSendButton(String,bool,bool) function as
it could be done by refering to preferences.
[Ref]: MainFragment: Reorganised code into functions to reduce
repeatition 

[Mod]: MainActivity:
-Updated to use the new interface function, and reworked them to use
preferences
-Introduced function to increase screen brightness, has issues.
[Fix]: MainActivity: Added thread safety when performing actions on
fragments.

title: [Mod]: Added the "Use camera flash" to the default preference
message:
[Mod]: Added the "Use camera flash" to the default preference

Currently set default value to "false", as it is still experimental.

title: Changed install loc to be auto & made flash frag keep screen on
message:
Changed install loc to be auto & made flash frag keep screen on

[Mod]: Mainfest file now specifies installLocation to be "auto"
[Mod]: Gave screen_flash fragment views the property of
keepScreenOn="true", to keep the frag visible when in use.

title: Moved MainFragment from MainActivity into its own class
message:
Moved MainFragment from MainActivity into its own class

[Ref]: Moved MainFragment into MainActivity. As such callbacks were
implemented to maintain interaction between activity and fragment.

title: [Fix]: The transcriber now cancels correctly
message:
[Fix]: The transcriber now cancels correctly

It was only partially cancelling before. Now it fully cancels.

title: [Fix]: Flash Util close was incomplete and not fully releasing cam.
message:
[Fix]: Flash Util close was incomplete and not fully releasing cam.

Made the close function unset the surfaceview callback to correct
"method called after release()" exception

title: Added untested functionality for flashlight functionality to main
message:
Added untested functionality for flashlight functionality to main

[Mod]: Added Camera and FlashLight permisions to AndroidManifest.
[Mod]: MainActivity + MainFragment:
-Added functionality for the flash checkbox, enabling/disabling based
upon the flash light accessibility.
-Added functionality to main to produce flashlight output which is in
theory, stable. It is currently completely untested. 
-Changed functionality of the send button in mainfragment to become a
cancel button + disable the input when in "flash" mode.
[Ref]: Reorganised the createView function of MainFragment to be more
readable.

title: Updated strings for flash checkbox & added a "hidden" SurfaceView
message:
Updated strings for flash checkbox & added a "hidden" SurfaceView

[Mod]: Changed the strings for flash checkbox to read: 
-"Use Camera Flash (Experimental)"
-"Use Camera Flash (Not Found)"
[Mod]: Added surface view for use with camera. Currently hidden behind
"send" button (but attributes are and must remain visible).

title: Added method to safely clean up the Flash util, updated doc, etc
message:
Added method to safely clean up the Flash util, updated doc, etc

[Mod][Doc]: Added method close() to clean up free the camera service by
releasing it. Updated documentation to explain the requirements.

title: [Fix]: Caught exceptions for outlier cases of no camera service
message:
[Fix]: Caught exceptions for outlier cases of no camera service

If there is no camera (such as emulator) there may be runtime error.
Fixed it to catch and return false instead of failing out. Additionally,
added a null check for the camera in case there is no camera (or the
above case)

title: Fixed check pressed state & switched direction of arrows
message:
Fixed check pressed state & switched direction of arrows

[Mod]: Toggle button arrow now points up for checked, down for
unchecked.
[Fix]: Pressed checked state is now fixed (did not show arrow).

title: Created custom toggle button for Advanced button/checbox
message:
Created custom toggle button for Advanced button/checbox

[Add]: To create the button, added:
-up and down arrows (png)
-drawables (up + down)
-statelist for checkbox
[Mod]: Main - Applied button drawable to checkbox.

title: Changed styling to be more like holo dark
message:
Changed styling to be more like holo dark

[Add]: Added a bunch of resources from: 
http://android-holo-colors.com/ to mimick the holo look on API <11.

Resources include:
-pngs for buttons + checkboxes
-statelists for said buttons
-style overrides to update buttons + checkboxes seemlessly

-Moved loop message to advanced settings
-Made camera flash checkbox visible (disabled still)
[Mod]: Added ability to toggle the advanced settings visible and
invisible to main.

title: Added loop checkbox + message looping, fixed the input retention
message:
Added loop checkbox + message looping, fixed the input retention

so it is retained when returning.

title: Enhanced var name readablity & set message interval to be shorter
message:
Enhanced var name readablity & set message interval to be shorter

title: Updated intial draft of MainActivity
message:
Updated intial draft of MainActivity

[Mod]: Updated fragment layout and changed fragment name to match.
[Mod]: Activity now has the basic functionality to:
-Take in string and display morse code
-Shift activity to fullscreen and back when needed
-Switch fragments when needed
-Make use of the headless fragment
-Retain state of relevant fields (tag names, input)

title: Added some basic colours, changed action bar style, added strings

[Add]: Added colours for the basis of white and black for use within the
app.

title: [Fix]: Fixed the cancel() & setUnitTime() functionalities
message:
[Fix]: Fixed the cancel() & setUnitTime() functionalities

-Unit time was neglecting the dot and symbol intervals
-cancel was only cancelling processing not sending

title: [Add]: Created headless fragment for the transcriber
message:
[Add]: Created headless fragment for the transcriber

Headless fragment eases the use with activities as it retains the 
instance and keeps the same Transcriber around (important if we need to
cancel)

title: Created MorseTranscriber for transcribing strings to morse
message:
Created MorseTranscriber for transcribing strings to morse

[Add]: IMorseTranscriber is the interface defining the interactions
for the transcriber.
[Add]: Created the MorseTranscriber which:
-trims + explodes the string
-parses the the string into morse characters (in a thread)
-sets the timers for the the morse to be transmitted
-includes interface to attach actions to

title: [Mod]: Updated flash fragment to notify when loaded
message:
[Mod]: Updated flash fragment to notify when loaded

-Added function to interface for when fragment view loads
-setRetainInstance(true)

title: [Add]: Created ScreenFlashFragment to alternate between 000 and fff
message:
[Add]: Created ScreenFlashFragment to alternate between 000 and fff

Allows caller to turn background on and off as well as define cancel
behaviour.

message: [Mod]: Changed the type patterns are stored as

title: [Add]: Created International Morse dictionary
message:
[Add]: Created International Morse dictionary

Partially adheres to the internation Morse code standard. Still requires
some more characters.

title: [Add]: Added MorseDictionary to define dictionary attributes
message:
[Add]: Added MorseDictionary to define dictionary attributes

MorseDictionary also contains the internal class MorseCharacter used to
